properties.description: Description: A storekeeper may have shot and killed James Taylor as he allegedly looted stores in a Hollywood strip mall. The shooting was ruled self-defense.
Description: An unidentified gunman shot Mexican-American 20-year-old Sosa as he allegedly looted a store .
Description: Andrews waslooting a store, then hit one officer in the head with a bottle, and another officer fired a shot at point-blank range, hitting Andrew in the face.
Description: Arsonists torched a Department store. Nearly four months later, on August 12, a worker found the body of Mustafa in the rubble.

Description: Evanshen the Good Samaritan. His mistake was trying to put out a fire started by looters at a check-cashing store. He slipped through a weakened portion of the office roof and died from burns and smoke inhalation.

Description: Maronian tried to intercede in an incedent when she was stabbed three times in the chest and twice in the back. Her attackers were convicted of burglary and assault; the jury hung on the murder charges.

Description: Police responded to the gunfight and exchanged fire with both groups. Someone in the rival group shot him. Detectives later learned the gun battle was a tragic mistake. Each group had been protecting Korean-owned stores and mistook the other for looters

Description: Ratinoff was shopping at the store because it was the nearest market open. Ratinoff was buying vegetables, when he knocked some cornhusks to the ground. He began arguing with someone, and the situation escalated. Police made an arrest.
Description: Sniper fire hit Pineda as he sat with his brother and friends in a car in East Hollywood. A judge dismissed murder charges at a preliminary hearing.
Description: Vela stayed with a broken down car, while his companions looked for a phone. When they returned, Vela was on his back in the street, with a gunshot wound to the chest.
Description: When Officers ordered Aguilar to raise his hands, the officer said he saw the butt of a gun in his waistband. Aguilar lowered his arms and the officer feared he was reaching for the gun.

Description: When a getaway car crashed, the suspects ran a short distance and exchanged gunfire with deputies. Garcia, who had followed in another car, joined the chase. The 15-year-old Mexican-American was shot in the chest.

Description: allegedly threatened a motorist, who turned out to be an off-duty LAPD officer. An off-duty L.A. Sheriff's deputy followed in the next car. It's unclear who started shooting, but people in all three vehicles exchanged fire. Orebo was thrown out of the car as it headed down the Florence Avenue off ramp.
Description: blue car pulled up and someone fired one shot, hitting Miranda in the chest.
Description: burned to death inside a grocery store looted and torched. Ross died, curled up under a metal desk in the office, with a wad of cash in a pant pocket.
Description: car collided with another one at Avalon Boulevard. The riot delayed paramedics.
Description: died in a police pursuit. the driver, lost control and slammed into a fire hydrant and brick wall. Police said the suspects tossed out a gun and stolen property during the chase.
Description: died in a police pursuit. the driver, lost control and slammed into a fire hydrant and brick wall. Police said the suspects tossed out a gun and stolen property during the chase.
Description: died in a police pursuit. the driver, lost control and slammed into a fire hydrant and brick wall. Police said the suspects tossed out a gun and stolen property during the chase.
Description: fell out of the back of his brother's truck and suffered severe head injuries.
Description: found face down on the street. He had been hit by a car. His death was ruled accidental.
Description: intervened to help neighbor and was struck in the head, suffering a broken skull.
Description: may have been talking on a gas-station pay phone when he took a shotgun blast to the chest.
Description: passing motorist found Netherly lying in the street. He had been shot in the left eye.
Description: robbed a gas station when he pulled a gun on police, he was shot twice in the chest.
Description: rode his motorcycle with his roommate on back. They pulled Haines, a local motorcycle mechanic, and his friend off the bike, robbed them and shot Haines.
Description: shopkeeper defending his property shot Solorzano, while he allegedly looted a store.
Description: shot through the right eye as he pleaded with looters not to burn down a store next to his house.

Description: someone in another car fired at his vehicle. The shot hit Epstein in the left temple. His car kept going until it hit a tree. While Epstein lay bleeding, rioters robbed him and looted his car.
Description: stood around a car, when shots rang out from a passing car. A bullet hit Wilkins, in the chest, ripping into his aorta.
Description: stood on astreet, where he had stopped on his way home from work. Someone drove by and shot him in the neck.
Description: the only unidentified riot victim -- died in a fire at Pep Boys. The body, discovered two days later.
Description: tried to help people involved in a head-on collision. Passersby gunned him down, the fatal shot piercing his heart.
Description: was found with a bullet wound in his chest. Detectives speculated Harrison might have been a sniper shot by police.
Description: was involved in a drug deal gone bad. He was fatally wounded as he tried to run from his killers. Two adults and a juvenile were convicted of murder.
Description: was riding in a small Datsun, moving eastbound on 51st Street, when her car slammed into the back of a Ford van
Description: was shot in the back as he walked. The LAPD determined that a National Guardsman shot Castro.
Description: was shot in the forehead as he walked on the street.
Description: was shot in the neck in a drive-by shooting. It appears an arrest was made, but the D.A. declined to prosecute.
Description: was stabbed to death. Police found the knife but no traceable prints.
Description: was standing with a large group of people when a gunman opened fire. Watson was struck in the head.
Description: was standing with another man when someone shot at them. Neal was hit in the head.

Description: worked as an armed security guard at a shopping center, where he joined a group of armed storeowners defending their property. During one looting spree, Bettan was shot.  LAPD investigators determined Bettan had been accidentally shot by one of his employers.
